text: Jesus|answered|them|, “Most \+w certainly|\+w* \+w I|\+w* \+w tell|\+w* \+w you|\+w*, \+w if|\+w* \+w you|\+w* \+w have|\+w* \+w faith|\+w* \+w and|\+w* don’\+w t|\+w* \+w doubt|\+w*, \+w you|\+w* \+w will|\+w* \+w not|\+w* \+w only|\+w* \+w do|\+w* \+w what|\+w* \+w was|\+w* \+w done|\+w* \+w to|\+w* \+w the|\+w* \+w fig|\+w* \+w tree|\+w*, \+w but|\+w* \+w even|\+w* \+w if|\+w* \+w you|\+w* \+w told|\+w* \+w this|\+w* \+w mountain|\+w*, ‘\+w Be|\+w* \+w taken|\+w* \+w up|\+w* \+w and|\+w* \+w cast|\+w* \+w into|\+w* \+w the|\+w* \+w sea|\+w*,’ \+w it|\+w* \+w would|\+w* \+w be|\+w* \+w done|\+w*.

When|the|natives saw|the|creature|hanging|from|his|hand|, they|said|to|one|another|, “ No|doubt|this|man|is|a|murderer|, whom|, though|he|has|escaped|from|the|sea|, yet|Justice|has|not|allowed|to|live|.”
He|recognized|it|, and|said, “ It|is|my|son|’s tunic|. An evil|animal|has|devoured him|. Joseph|is|without doubt|torn|in|pieces|.”

He|said|to|them|, “Doubtless \+w you|\+w* \+w will|\+w* \+w tell|\+w* \+w me|\+w* \+w this|\+w* \+w proverb|\+w*, ‘\+w Physician|\+w*, \+w heal|\+w* \+w yourself|\+w*! \+w Whatever|\+w* \+w we|\+w* \+w have|\+w* heard \+w done|\+w* \+w at|\+w* \+w Capernaum|\+w*, \+w do|\+w* \+w also|\+w* \+w here|\+w* \+w in|\+w* \+w your|\+w* \+w hometown|\+w*.’”
Immediately|Jesus|stretched|out|his|hand|, took|hold|of|him|, and|said|to|him|, “\+w You|\+w* \+w of|\+w* \+w little|\+w* \+w faith|\+w*, \+w why|\+w* \+w did|\+w* \+w you|\+w* \+w doubt|\+w*?”

because|an|excellent|spirit|, knowledge|, understanding|, interpreting|of|dreams|, showing of|dark sentences, and|dissolving|of|doubts|were|found|in|the|same Daniel|, whom|the|king|named|Belteshazzar|. Now|let|Daniel|be|called|, and|he|will|show the|interpretation|.”

\+w For|\+w* most \+w certainly|\+w* \+w I|\+w* \+w tell|\+w* \+w you|\+w*, \+w whoever|\+w* \+w may|\+w* \+w tell|\+w* \+w this|\+w* \+w mountain|\+w*, ‘\+w Be|\+w* \+w taken|\+w* \+w up|\+w* \+w and|\+w* \+w cast|\+w* \+w into|\+w* \+w the|\+w* \+w sea|\+w*,’ \+w and|\+w* doesn’\+w t|\+w* \+w doubt|\+w* \+w in|\+w* \+w his|\+w* \+w heart|\+w*, \+w but|\+w* \+w believes|\+w* \+w that|\+w* \+w what|\+w* \+w he|\+w* \+w says|\+w* \+w is|\+w* \+w happening|\+w*, \+w he|\+w* \+w shall|\+w* \+w have|\+w* \+w whatever|\+w* \+w he|\+w* \+w says|\+w*.
He|said|to|them|, “\+w Why|\+w* \+w are|\+w* \+w you|\+w* \+w troubled|\+w*? \+w Why|\+w* \+w do|\+w* \+w doubts|\+w* arise \+w in|\+w* \+w your|\+w* \+w hearts|\+w*?

They|rose|early|in|the|morning|and|went|out|into|the|wilderness|of|Tekoa|. As|they|went|out|, Jehoshaphat|stood|and|said|, “ Listen|to|me|, Judah|and|you|inhabitants|of|Jerusalem|! Believe in|the|LORD|your|God|, so|you|will|be|established|! Believe his|prophets|, so|you|will|prosper|.”

Jesus|said|to|her|, “\+w Woman|\+w*, \+w believe|\+w* \+w me|\+w*, \+w the|\+w* \+w hour|\+w* \+w is|\+w* \+w coming|\+w* \+w when|\+w* \+w neither|\+w* \+w in|\+w* \+w this|\+w* \+w mountain|\+w* \+w nor|\+w* \+w in|\+w* \+w Jerusalem|\+w* \+w will|\+w* \+w you|\+w* \+w worship|\+w* \+w the|\+w* \+w Father|\+w*.
\+w But|\+w* \+w you|\+w* don’\+w t|\+w* \+w believe|\+w*, \+w because|\+w* \+w you|\+w* \+w are|\+w* \+w not|\+w* \+w of|\+w* \+w my|\+w* \+w sheep|\+w*, \+w as|\+w* \+w I|\+w* told \+w you|\+w*.

\+w I|\+w* \+w am|\+w* \+w glad|\+w* \+w for|\+w* \+w your|\+w* \+w sakes|\+w* \+w that|\+w* \+w I|\+w* \+w was|\+w* \+w not|\+w* \+w there|\+w*, \+w so|\+w* \+w that|\+w* \+w you|\+w* \+w may|\+w* \+w believe|\+w*. \+w Nevertheless|\+w*, \+w let|\+w*’s \+w go|\+w* \+w to|\+w* \+w him|\+w*.”
